title: Innovation to Improve the Efficiency of Rooftop Solar Panels

title: Developing a Smart Cooling Solution for Efficient Photovoltaic Systems
partner: Collaboration between Polines and PT Sogy Energy Indonesia
description: The Polines Service Team and PT Sogy Energy Indonesia developed the *Smart Cooling Solution for Efficient Photovoltaic Roofing* to help rural communities improve the efficiency of rooftop solar panels by up to 20%. This technology utilizes IoT to automatically clean the panels and reduce heat, while also simplifying maintenance through an easily accessible application. With this solution, rural communities can more efficiently harness renewable energy while reducing technical challenges in solar panel maintenance.
